show_name: Ame to Shoujo to Watashi no Tegami (ONA)
other_title: Rain, the Little Girl, and My Letter
Дождь, маленькая девочка и моё письмо (Russian)
plot: Katari, a young girl who dreams of becoming a novelist, writes a love letter to a boy at her school. Unwittingly, she is creating a "short story" that will move a little girl's heart.
